snippet: The Islamic State has claimed responsibility for the killing. Five people have been hacked to death in Bangladesh in the past 10 days.
abstract: Bangladeshi police detain three men suspected in murder of Hindu tailor Nikhil Chandra Joarder, latest in series of hacking deaths in country; Islamic State had claimed responsibility for killing, citing fact that tailor had been jailed for blasphemy.

byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and GEETA ANAND
byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka, and Geeta Anand reported from Mumbai.

lead_paragraph: The Islamic State has claimed responsibility for the killing. Five people have been hacked to death in Bangladesh in the past 10 days.

headline.main: Police in Bangladesh Detain 3 in Killing of Hindu Tailor
headline.print_headline: Bangladeshis Detain 3 Men in a Killing

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
